Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Questions
A test is coming up. How do you study for it?
Can you focus on something you like?
When the going gets tough, do you get going?
There is a bucket. If you put water in it, how high will you fill it?
You are offered a choice of two gifts. Which one will you take?
You broke a rotten egg in your room! What will you do?
A friend brought over something you'd forgotten. How do you thank your friend?
There is a wallet at the side of a road.

answers.text: Turn it in to the police!

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: You're going bungee jumping for the first time. Since it's scary, you decide to test the jump with a doll... And the bungee cord snaps! Will you still try to make a jump anyway?
There is an alien invasion! What will you do?
You valiantly fight the aliens... But, you are defeated... An alien says to you... "YOU HAVE IMPRESSED US. IT WAS A PLEASURE TO SEE. JOIN US, AND TOGETHER WE SHALL RULE THE WORLD." What will you do?
There is a scream from behind a door! How will you react?
A delinquent is hassling a girl on a busy city street! What will you do?
Are you a cheerful personality?
Do you like to noisily enjoy yourself with others?
It's the summer holidays! Where would you like to go?
A foreign person has started up a conversation with you. To be honest, you don't have a clue what this fellow is saying. How do you reply?

answers.text: Um... Could you say that again?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Have you ever made a pitfall trap?
Do you like pranks?
Are there many things that you would like to do?
Your friend is being bullied! What do you do?
Do you like groan-inducing puns?
Do you tend to laugh a lot?
Do others often call you childish?
Do you like to imagine things for your amusement?
A human hand extends out of a toilet! What would you do?

answers.text: Close the lid without a word.

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Grab any digit on your left hand with your right hand. Which digit did you grab?
You are suddenly locked inside a pitch-black room! What do you do?
Can you go into a haunted house?
You receive a gift! But you don't know what's in it. You're curious, so what do you do?
You win a lottery! What do you do with the money?
You come across a treasure chest! What do you do?
Your friend fails to show up for a meeting at the promised time. What do you do?
Your country's leader is in front of you. How do you speak to him or her?
Do others tell you to watch what you say?
Do you think you are cool? Be honest.
Do you occasionally consider yourself dull and overly cautious?
Do you dream of lounging around idly without much excitement?
Do you like to fight?
Do you often yawn?
Are you often late for school or meetings?
Do you get the feeling that you've slowed down lately?
It is a pleasant day at the beach. How do you feel?

answers.text: I want to go home soon!

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you fall asleep without noticing?
Do you feel lonesome when you are alone?
Do you hate to be the last person to leave class at the end of a school day?
What do you do with your room's light when you're going to bed at night?
It's a weekend, but no one will play with you... What do you do?
Do you sometimes run out of things to do all of a sudden?
How quickly do you respond to an e-mail?
There is a person you like... But there's no opportunity to get close. What do you do?

answers.text: Pull a prank to get attention.

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: The road forks to the right and left. You are told there is a treasure on the right side. What do you do?
On vacation outings, you want to...
It's the summer festival! Do you like carnivals?
Somebody calls you "weird but funny." How does that make you feel?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Questions
8 of the following questions are chosen at random. After these questions, the player will be asked for their gender.
Have you ever accidentally revealed a personal secret that someone shared with you?
What do you do with your allowance?
Would you even consider sticking to a plan to do ten sit-ups a day?

answers.text: No! Who'd want to do that?!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: If you don't know something, do you come clean and admit it?
A fortune-teller says that you have a bad future ahead of you. How do you react?
You hear a rumor that might make you rich! What do you do?
How do you blow up a balloon?

answers.text: As close to breaking as possible!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you state your opinion even when it's not what everyone else thinks?
You want to reveal that you like someone a whole bunch! What do you do?

answers.text: Show it a little by playing together.
Make it obvious...by playing a prank!
State it clearly for all to hear!
Keep it to myself! It's too risky!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're on a stroll when a TV crew pounces on you for an interview. What do you do?

answers.text: Yuck it up! Woo-hoo! I'm on TV!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You feel a burst of happiness! How about expressing it with a little dance?
You see a parade coming down the street. What do you do?
Your friend tells a joke that's horribly corny! How do you react?
Can you strike up conversations with new people easily?
Do you get injured a lot?
You see a ball on the ground. What do you do?

answers.text: Spiff it up, shiny and new!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: What do you think of jungle exploration?
You discover a secret passage in a basement. What do you do?
Your friend takes a spectacular fall! What do you do?
Have you ever wanted to communicate with aliens from another planet?
Have you ever upset a friend when you were just kidding around?
Hey, what's that? There's someone behind you! So...did you look just now?

answers.text: Don't do that! It scared me!
OK, I admit it. You tricked me.
No way, I didn't fall for it.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Someone who works at a store suggests an item that isn't quite what you're looking for. But you like this person. What do you do?
You run into a new person that you haven't talked to very much before. What do you do?

answers.text: Make an excuse to get away!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You think you hear someone call your name. But no one's around...so what was it?
Do you find yourself jumping to the wrong conclusion a lot of the time?
Do you change the channels often while watching TV?
You find something at a great bargain! What do you do?

answers.text: Think about whether you need it.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're packing your classroom's snacks for a picnic when you get hungry. What do you do?

answers.text: Hold myself back and pack it all up.
What snacks? They're in my belly!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Are you a rebel at heart?
When walking in a group, do you tend to be the one at the front?
Do you think that you might be a genius?
Would you feel comfortable stating your opinion to a very important person?
Are you a city person or a country person?
You're about to take the last cookie when your friend wolfs it down! What do you do?

answers.text: I weep for my lost cookie.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You've spent forever stacking dominoes...One more and you're done...OH, NO! You've knocked them over! What do you do?

answers.text: I'm too crushed to start again.
I set up the dominoes again...

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you get bothered by noise and ruckus around you?
You've just stuffed yourself with a good meal when a great dessert arrives. What do you do?

answers.text: Eat it. Who cares if I'm stuffed?
Turn it down. It's too fattening!
Yummy! I love dessert the most!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You have a really important test tomorrow! What do you do?

answers.text: Wing it! I'm sure it will be fine!
Test?! I think I have a fever...

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're eating at a restaurant when you abruptly realize that everyone's gone! What do you do?

answers.text: Alone?! I look for an employee!
I swipe food from other tables!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you find yourself humming or singing often?
The phone's ringing! What do you do?

answers.text: Ignore it and let it ring.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Your friend seems to be having a fun chat out of earshot. What do you do?
Do you like being the center of attention?
You're told to wait in a big, empty room. What do you do?

answers.text: Cradle my knees and sit in the corner!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you have lots of stuff you bought, thinking it was all cool, but don't use anymore?
Have you had any hobbies for a long time?
Do you cancel plans to meet others at the last second?
Do you like to do things according to plan?
Do you think that lies are sometimes necessary?
You spot a deserted ship on the high seas! What do you think the ship holds?

answers.text: Nothing! The ship is merely a mirage!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you think that anything goes when it comes to winning?
Your friend is crying right in front of you! What made that happen?

answers.text: My friend fell down, no doubt!
I wonder if it's my fault?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you often forget to lock the door when you go out?
You attend a fine dinner at a friend's house. How do you behave?

answers.text: Enjoy the meal in polite moderation.
Ask to take the leftovers home!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You have to move a heavy suitcase. What will you do?
You muster your courage and go to a graveyard at night...and see a woman soaked to the skin just standing there! What do you do?

answers.text: So what? It's just a lady.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You see a cake that is past its expiration date, but only by one day. What do you do?

answers.text: Think about it briefly, then decide.
Get someone to try it first.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Your friend says that your shirt is inside out. What do you do?

answers.text: Say that it's the latest fashion!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're daydreaming...when your friend sprays you with water! What do you do?
You're in a play with friends. What kind of role do you prefer?
You're in class when you realize that you really have to go to the restroom! What do you do?
You're in the final mile of a marathon, but the last stretch is exhausting! What will you do?
You're on a walk when you smell something delicious. What do you do?

answers.text: Try to imagine what it is.
Think about how hungry I am...

Explorers of Sky.text: Questions
The game always starts off with:
"Did you play Explorers of Time or Explorers of Darkness?"

This does not give any personality points by itself, but if "Yes" is answered, certain Natures will have points added to them after the player has chosen their gender. These correspond to the new choices of Pokémon available in Explorers of Sky - Phanpy, Shinx, and Riolu if male; Vulpix and Eevee if female.

Additionally, the following Pokémon's base recruit rate will be doubled as long as the player has not recruited them already. Most of these can be found in dungeons found at various points of the main story; Pokémon marked with a dagger (†) can be recruited only after the credits roll, while Feraligatr (§) has special conditions. Furthermore, Porygon2, Rampardos, Bastiodon and Bronzong internally use these doubled rates, but cannot be found in any dungeons that allow for recruitment.
Afterwards, 8 of the following questions will be asked at random. After these questions, the player will be asked for their gender.
Have you ever blurted something out without thinking about the consequences first?
Do you want to be taller someday?
Once you've decided something, do you see it through to the end?
Have you ever said "Nice to meet you" to someone you met previously?
You're at a movie theater. What are you there to see?
Have you ever looked at your reflection in their mirror and thought, "What a cool person!"?
Have you ever thought that if you dug into your backyard, you would find a buried treasure?
Do you prefer to play outside rather than inside?
You discover a beat-up looking treasure chest in some ruins. What do you do?
Have you ever realized you were hogging the conversation?
When you see a switch, do you have an overwhelming urge to flip it?
Have you ever forgotten you bought something and bought another one?
Do you think it's important to always aim to be the best?
Do you want to be famous?
If you saw someone do something bad, could you scold them?
Have you ever told a joke that just completely fell flat?
Do you like lively parties?
Are you truly sincere when you apologize?
Do you like karaoke?
You're hiking up a mountain when you reach diverging paths. Which path do you take?
Your friend takes a spectacular fall! What do you do?
You have a really important test tomorrow! What do you do?

answers.text: Wing it! I'm sure I'll be fine!
Test?! I think I have a fever...

Explorers of Sky.text: Have you ever accidentally called a teacher "Mom" or "Dad"?
There's a rumor there's a ghost haunting the school bathrooms! What do you do?
You're in class when you realize you really have to go to the restroom! What do you do?
Do you think you have good study habits?

answers.text: Well, I never lose at sports!

Explorers of Sky.text: What's your studying style?

answers.text: I just cover what I need to do.
I can't really do it alone...

Explorers of Sky.text: You're packing your classroom's snacks when you get hungry! What do you do?

answers.text: Hold myself back and pack it all up.
What snacks? They're in my belly!

Explorers of Sky.text: You see a cake that's past its expiration date, but only by 1 day. What do you do?

answers.text: Think about it briefly, then decide.
Get someone to try it first.

Explorers of Sky.text: You've stuffed yourself with a good meal when a great dessert arrives. What do you do?

answers.text: Eat it. Who cares if I'm stuffed?
Turn it down. It's too fattening!
Yum! I love dessert the most!

Explorers of Sky.text: Your friend made a meal that tastes terrible. They ask, "How is it?". You say...?
You're eating at a very fancy restaurant known for its food. Which course do you select?
Everyone's sharing a dessert, and there's an extra piece. What do you do?
Your friend offers to treat you to dinner. What do you do?
Everyone around you is laughing at something you think is pretty boring. What do you do?
Do you prefer being busy or having a lot of free time?
You're about to buy a popular game when someone else gets the last copy! How do you feel?
You run into a new person that you haven't talked to very much before. What do you do?

answers.text: Make an excuse to get away!

Explorers of Sky.text: Good news and bad news... which one do you want to hear first?
Hey, what's that? There's someone behind you! So... did you look just now?

answers.text: Don't do that! You scared me!
OK, I admit it. You tricked me.
No way. I didn't fall for it.

Explorers of Sky.text: How are your mornings?
You've been invited to a wonderful party. It's time for the party to start, but there's nobody there! You think...?

answers.text: Maybe I have the day wrong?

Explorers of Sky.text: You take off your shoes to realize your socks are different colors! What do you do?
Did you make any New Year's Resolutions?
You're in a completely silent assembly when you suddenly hear someone pass gas! How do you react?
You're running a marathon, and at the start you fall flat on your face! What will you do?
You find something at a great bargain price! What do you do?

answers.text: Think about whether I need it.

Explorers of Sky.text: You've been asked to do a difficult task. What will you do?
You notice a toy you bought for full price yesterday is marked as half the price today! How do you feel?
Your friend is running a little late to meet you. Is that OK?
Do you think that, no matter what happens, life goes on?
The phone's ringing! What do you do?

answers.text: Ignore it and let it ring.

Explorers of Sky.text: Your friend seems to be making plans to hang out, just out of earshot. You think...
Do you think it's important to be fashionably late?
You've won a big raffle ticket! You say...
Do you think blaming someone else on something you did is sometimes necessary?
Your friend suddenly won't listen to you, when everything was fine yesterday. What do you think?
You fail miserably! Everyone found out, and they're disappointed in you... what do you do?
You want to reveal you like someone a whole bunch! What do you do?

answers.text: Make it obvious by... playing a prank!
State it clearly for all to hear!
Keep it to myself! It's too risky!

Explorers of Sky.text: The people at the next table are singing for someone's birthday. What do you do?
You're on a stroll when a TV crew pounces you for an interview! What do you do?

answers.text: Yuck it up! Woo-hoo! I'm on TV!

Explorers of Sky.text: You see a big and comfortable bed. Your first reaction is to...
You're daydreaming... when your friend sprays you with water! What do you do?
You've been handed a large bag as a souvenir. What do you do?

answers.text: Wait until I get home to open it.
